com.tckb.data.writer

Interface RecordWriter<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRecordWriter, CustomerWriter, JsonRecordWriter, MarkdownWriter, SqliteSqlWriter, XmlRecordWriter, YamlRecordWriter

    public interface RecordWriter<T>
    Created by tckb on 27/09/16.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String serialize(Collection<DataRecord<? extends SerializableData>> dataRecords)
      Serializes the data to a string

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        String serialize(Collection<DataRecord<? extends SerializableData>> dataRecords)
        Serializes the data to a string
        Parameters:
        dataRecords - the datarecords to be serialized
        Returns:
        the serialzied data

      • serialize

        String serialize(File fileTosave,
                 Collection<DataRecord<? extends SerializableData>> dataRecords)
          throws IOException
        Serializes the dataRecords to a file
        Parameters:
        fileTosave - the file to write the data.

        NOTE: if the file already exists, then file is *not* overridden, instead a new file is created with the same name and the data is written to it.

        dataRecords -
        Returns:
        the absolute path to the file that has been created
        Throws:
        IOException
